document_data.caption: The temple of the Dragon Queen erupting within the [[Well of Dragons]].
document_data.name: Tiamat's Temple
document_data.mainbody: '''Tiamat's temple''' was an unholy fortress dedicated to the worship of [[Tiamat]], the Queen of Dragons. Resting within her realm on the plane of [[Avernus]] on the [[Nine Hells]], the temple briefly ascended to [[Toril]] at the [[Well of Dragons]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The temple could be found in [[Tiamat's Lair]], the goddess' [[divine realm]] in Avernus.
document_data.Structure:
The layout of the temple vaguely resembled a five-pointed star, with five chapels built at each of the star's points around a central apse. Each chapel corresponded to one of the five colors of [[chromatic dragon]]s that composed Tiamat's physical form. Massive spires featuring angular architecture rose {{SI|50|ft}} above both the apse and the five surrounding chapels. The surrounding spires featured imposing, twisting steeples that came together to at the central spire.

The central spire rose another {{SI|100|ft}} above the point where all the spires met, terminating in a site referred to as the temple's sanctuary.

Interior.Atmosphere: Despite the magnificence of its size and grand implications of its arrival to the Realms, Tiamat's temple held an aura of bleak lifelessness,

document_data.Rumors & Legends: Within the hoard that was amassed by the Cult of the Dragon to appease Tiamat were the goddess' ''[[Tiamat's Orb of Majesty|orb of majesty]]''. powerful [[item enchantment|enchanted]] cloaks associated with [[Lathander]] and the [[elven]] [[Seldarine]], and the rare tome ''[[Icantations of the Dragon Queen]]''.
